fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 180
fields.bodyText: * each clue or its solution involves the word ANT. In some cases it must be added to the clue; in others it must be removed from the solution Across 8 plein-air PL[-ANT]/IE(rev)/RAIN(anag) 9 meant ME[+ANT] 10,26 antelope [+ANT]ELOPE 11 on the level NOT(anag)/HE  EL 12 ranted R[+ANT]ED 14 chessman CH[-ANT] + SAS MEN (anag) 16 infused INF[-ANT]/USED 17 Florida [-ANT]I/D(ecay) in FLORA 21 asked for ASK[-ANT] + RO  DE (rev) 24 trench TRENCH[-ANT] 25 Gallo-Roman GALL[-ANT] + MOOR/AN (anag) 27 flak FLA(w) + K[-ANT] 28 topee TO  E/(reverenc)E 29 unwanted UNW[+ANT]ED Down 1 plantain PL[+ANT]AIN 2 give GI[-ANT] + V(irtuoso)/E(xtolling) 3 canoodle C[-ANT]/A/NOODLE 4 critics RACIST less AS (anag) + [-ANT]ICS 5 impede I’M/PED[-ANT]/(refus)E 6 page PAGE[-ANT] 7 Athena (p)ATH/[-ANT]E/N(igell)A 13 truce TRU[-ANT] + C(ocaine)/E(cstasy) 15 serge SERGE[-ANT] 18 late news TEN[-ANT] in WALES (anag) 19 deceased DEC[-ANT]/EASED 20 grampus GR[-ANT]/AMP/US 22 shanty SH[+ANT]Y 23 furled fir (hom) + LE[-ANT]/D(ead) 27 fond FOND[-ANT]
